title: Feeder
body:
ok this one game, it was like a normal ranked game but this ekko gets ganked lvl 2 and he start raging and start calling our jg bad. after that he got ganked again and after that he just fed the whole game. I even have hd footage of the game and u you can clearly tell that he is intentionally feeding because his build and his score. I'm tires of this bull crap, if it happens once I believe that the guys proberly had a bad day but there are way too many people out there that need to be punished and should get what they deserve.
here is my email if u want the footage (riot personal only)
Gurmanjeetsingh131@gmail.com
IF YOU ARE NOT GONNA DO SHIT ABOUT THIS U MIGHT ASWELL UNBAN TYLER 1!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Did you remember to report the player in the post-game lobby?

Reporting the player is the best option when things like this occur.
